edu.ohio.ent.cs5500

Class Arc

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ohio.ent.cs5500.Arc
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DirectedArc, UndirectedArc

    public abstract class Arc
extends java.lang.Object
    CS 4500/5500 Advanced OO Design and GUI Techniques.
    This class is written as part of the course cs4500/5500 under guidance and instruction of Dr. Dusan Sormaz.
    This is the superclass for all types of arcs. Contains the properties and functionalities common to both undirected and directed arcs.
    Author:
    Arif
